someone.translation[0].definitions[0].de: used to mean a person, when you do not know or do not say who the person is
someone.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: What would you do if someone tried to rob you in the street?
Will someone please explain what’s going on?
Can you ask someone else  (=a different person) to help you? I’m really busy.
Have Brooks or someone fax this to New York right away.
‘When are you planning to hire someone?’ ‘As soon as we find someone suitable.’
